name: GroConnect
0:
”Alexa, ask Gro to start watering.”
”Alexa, ask Gro to water zone five for six minutes.”
”Alexa, ask Gro to stop.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gro
Developer Terms of Use
des: Control your Gro Smart Watering Controller with your Alexa device. Run all your zones or specify a zone and runtime duration. This skill requires you to have a Gro account and device already set up.
